name: Bonbon Mix (1Kg)
description: Inside each bag, you'll find a tantalizing selection of seven delicious bonbon flavours: apple, blue raspberry, bubblegum, cherry, lemon, strawberry & watermelon.

name: Bonbon Mix (500g)
description: Inside each bag, you'll find a tantalizing selection of seven delicious bonbon flavours: apple, blue raspberry, bubblegum, cherry, lemon, strawberry & watermelon.

name: Fizzy Mix (1Kg)
description: Packed to the brim with up to 25 different varieties of fizzy sweets, this tantalizing assortment guarantees a mouthwatering adventure with every bite.

name: Fizzy Mix (500g)
description: Packed to the brim with up to 25 different varieties of fizzy sweets, this tantalizing assortment guarantees a mouthwatering adventure with every bite.

name: Mega Mix (1Kg)
description: Bursting with an extensive assortment of up to 50 different plain and fizzy sweets, this colossal mix promises a whirlwind of flavor and excitement with every bite.

name: Mega Mix (500g)
description: Bursting with an extensive assortment of up to 50 different plain and fizzy sweets, this colossal mix promises a whirlwind of flavor and excitement with every bite.

name: Pencil Mix (500g)
description: The tasty flavours include Apple, Blue Raspberry, Tutti Frutti, Strawberry, Fizzy Strawberry, Fizzy Rainbow Twist & Fizzy Cola.

name: Plain Mix (1Kg)
description: Overflowing with up to 25 different varieties of plain sweets, this delectable assortment offers a delightful array of flavors and textures to satisfy every sweet tooth.

name: Plain Mix (500g)
description: Overflowing with up to 25 different varieties of plain sweets, this delectable assortment offers a delightful array of flavors and textures to satisfy every sweet tooth.

name: Halloween Mix (1Kg)
description: Packed with over 20 different plain & fizzy Halloween-themed sweets, this tasty bag of jellies is perfect for parties, gifts, or even trick-or-treaters.

name: Tayto Banshee Bones
description: Whether you're seeking a tangy snack to liven up your day or craving a flavourful treat with a punch, Tayto Banshee Bones crisps are sure to hit the spot.

name: Vidal Bloody Eyes (1Kg)
description: Perfect for adding a creepy touch to your Halloween party or treat bags, these bloody eyes are as delicious as they are eerie!

name: Vidal Jelly Anacondas (1Kg)
description: Perfect for a wild snack or adding a playful twist to any party, these long, stretchy anacondas are as tasty as they are fun to eat!

name: Vidal Jelly Bones (1.5Kg)
description: Perfect for Halloween parties or adding a playful twist to any treat table, these jelly bones are a deliciously fun way to celebrate the season!

name: Vidal Jelly Pumpkins (1Kg)
description: This 1Kg bag is packed with soft, chewy pumpkin-shaped jellies bursting with fruity flavour.

name: Vidal Sour Feet (1Kg)
description: Bursting with fruity flavour, these fun and tasty treats are perfect for those who love a delicious sour kick in every bite!

name: Vidal Spooky Spiders (1.7Kg)
description: Perfect for Halloween parties or anytime you crave a creepy-crawly treat, these spooky spiders are bursting with fruity goodness & a deliciously sour bite!

name: Freeze Dried Assorted Mix
description: This exciting blend features freeze-dried versions of your favorite sweets like fried eggs, watermelon slices, Skittles, & Swizzels.

name: Freeze Dried Bonbons
description: These airy, crunchy bites intensify the fruity flavour of traditional bonbons, offering a unique and satisfying texture.

name: Freeze Dried Skittles
description: Perfect for a fun and unique snack, freeze-dried Skittles offer an exciting twist on a fan-favourite sweet.

name: Freeze Dried Swizzels Chew Bars
description: Perfect for fans of classic sweets, freeze-dried Swizzels Chew Bars offer a fun & flavourful snacking experience with a delightful crunch!

name: Freeze Dried Wham Extreme Chew Bars
description: Perfect for fans of bold & sour flavours, this bag of freeze-dried Wham Extreme Chew Bars offer an exciting & crunchy twist on a beloved treat!

name: Tayto Thai Rings
description: Infused with the essence of Thai cuisine, these crisps offer a tantalizing taste experience that's both bold and satisfying.

name: Tayto Hot Lips
description: Each crunchy bite offers a tantalizing blend of heat and spice, perfectly balanced for an unforgettable snacking experience.

name: Tayto Banshee Bones
description: Each crunchy bite delivers a burst of zesty vinegar paired with a hint of salt, creating a tantalizing taste experience that's both bold and satisfying.

name: Tayto Onion Rings
description: These rings have layers and layers of flavour and you will be jumping through rings of fire for more.

name: Tayto Spicy Rings
description: Bursting with bold spices and a satisfying crunch, Tayto Spicy Rings are the ultimate snack for spice lovers seeking a flavourful thrill.

name: Juicy Drop Mallows Cola
description: Perfect for sweet lovers seeking a fun and tasty twist, Juicy Drop Mallows Cola offer a delicious combination of sweetness & fizzy cola goodness.

name: Juicy Drop Mallows Raspberry
description: Perfect for sweet lovers seeking a fun and tasty twist, Juicy Drop Mallows Raspberry offer a delicious combination of sweetness & fizzy raspberry goodness.

name: Milkybar Rowntree's Jelly
description: Perfect for a sweet snack or dessert, Milkybar Rowntree's Jelly & Ice Cream offer a playful & delicious twist on a classic favourite.

name: Refreshers Fizzy Softies
description: With 120g of fruity, fizzy goodness, these softies are the perfect way to satisfy your sweet tooth.

name: A&W Root Beer
description: Imported from the USA, this classic soda offers a smooth blend of sweet and spicy flavours with a hint of vanilla, creating the perfect refreshing drink.

name: BARR American Cream Soda
description: Perfect for enjoying on its own or paired with your favorite snacks, BARR American Cream Soda is sure to become a go-to beverage for any occasion.

name: BARR Bubblegum
description: This whimsical beverage brings the nostalgic taste of bubblegum to life in a fizzy and refreshing drink.

name: Gatorade Cool Blue
description: With its smooth, fruity flavour, a bottle of Gatorade Cool Blue is perfect for replenishing your body during workouts or whenever you need a revitalising boost.
